item.title: The Cartoonisation of the Moral High Ground
item.description: BLM, trans gender rights and other moral crusades are being exploited to avoid addressing larger, more pervasive and expensive issues. The biggest losers in this are Women. Morality is often turned into a cartoon People enjoy feeling ‘right’. Our brains are pattern recognition sponges that continuously bash the world into a shape resembling our vision of reality, the subjective or, amongst a group of us, the shared reality of the intersubjective.
